title: One Click Trade Mark Website
subTitle: This is a subtitle
overviewContent: I developed the One Click Trade Mark website to provide clients with an easy-to-use platform for registering their trademarks online. This solution streamlines the registration process, allowing users to navigate steps with minimal effort. The site includes secure payment options and real-time status updates, enhancing client satisfaction and promoting efficient trademark management.

skills: Tool: Eclipse, Visual Studio Code (Development), DBeaver (RDB)
Programming: Java, Thymeleaf, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, MySQL
Cloud Services: AWS Elastic Beanstalk, AWS Load Balancer, Route 53
Other: RESTful API, Agile Methodology, MVC pattern
jd: Organised and oversaw project planning and execution.
Designed the architecture and created a detailed sitemap to support project structure.
Configured and optimised the development and production environments.
Evaluated and integrated third-party APIs, including IP Australia API, PayPal API, and Google Location Autocomplete API, to enhance website functionality.
Designed and implemented the database in AWS RDS.
Developed the website using a RESTful API and successfully deployed it to AWS.
Ensured compliance with W3C web standards for validation and accessibility.
Performed rigorous unit testing and integration testing to maintain quality.
Authored comprehensive technical documentation and user guides.
Contributed to all stages of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) with active collaboration across teams and stakeholders.
Implemented SEO strategies, including optimised meta tags, sitemap generation, and keyword optimisation.
